title: Studio Available Now! Call And Book A Tour Today!
posting_body: This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 602 Sq.
Come and see what vibrant and beautiful living looks like.
Alder is a collection of brand-new apartment homes adorned with modern interiors, designer-selected finishes and signature style.
Throw in some high-end amenities and a central Northridge CA location, and you’ve got the perfect place to call home.
Air Conditioning, Dishwasher, Walk-in Closet*, In-Home Washer/Dryer*, High-Speed Internet Available, Balcony/Patio/Terrace*, Stainless Steel Appliances, Hardwood Floors*

Entertainment Club Room, Fitness Center, Pet Washing Station, Dining and Shopping Nearby, Smoke-free Community, Yoga Studio, Pet Friendly, Pool, Courtyard, Beautifully Landscaped Grounds, Grilling Area, Cats Welcome, Courtyard, Entertainment Club Room, On-Site Management Team
